movie.title: Fists of the White Lotus
movie.description_intro: The monk Hung Wen-Ting fights against the evil priest White Lotus.
movie.description_full: The monk Hung Wen-Ting fights against the evil priest White Lotus.

movies.title: Office Uprising
movies.summary: Desmond is an underachiever working at Ammotech, a major weapons manufacturing firm. However, Desmond soon discovers Zolt, a popular energy drink created by the military, has turned his boss and coworkers into violent psychopaths. Now Desmond must finally rise to the challenge in order to survive a building full of psychotic coworkers armed with the newest weaponry.
movies.description_full: Desmond is an underachiever working at Ammotech, a major weapons manufacturing firm. movies.title: Final Destination 3
movies.summary: When Wendy Christensen has a vision of an accident on a roller coaster, resulting in her and her friends' deaths, she instantly begins to panic and gets off the ride, causing some of her friends to get off as well. The remaining friends, including Wendy's boyfriend, are stuck on the roller coaster and find themselves involved in the accident. With Death waiting around the corner, Wendy and Kevin Fischer must try and work out Death's plan, before they and the remaining survivors end up dead.

movies.title: Humanoids from the Deep
movies.summary: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.
movies.description_full: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.

movies.title: Treasure Island
movies.summary: Young Jim Hawkins is the only one who can sucessfully get a schooner to a legendary Island known for buried Treasure. But aboard the ship is a mysterious cook named John Silver, whose true motivation on the journey challenges Jim's trust in the entire crew.
